response.overview: When two inquisitive children stumble upon an ancient book, they unwittingly open a fascinating gateway to adventure. This super book transports Chris, Joy and their toy robot, Gizmo, back across the centuries, and plops them right in the middle of actual Bible happenings. In this exciting animated series they meet Noah, Jonah, watch the Red Sea part, and are there in the stable with baby Jesus. Kids will thrill to the breathtaking action, and remember forever the heartwarming lessons each episode portrays.  Episodes Include; "The First Christmas" and "Miracles of Love"  "The First Christmas" - Witness the events that led to the first Christmas and the beginnings of God's great design of salvation for mankind.  "Miracles of Love" - Witness the miracles of Jesus. See him turn water into wine at a wedding; then heal the sick, blind and lame. His life was perfect as he did everything God had Him to do.
response.title: Superbook: Special Christmas Volume
